title: Unto the East: Words in Waiting
description: "Unto the Words in Waiting" chronicles the experience of the author, Mary ElizaBeth Peters, currently awaiting a double lung transplant for cystic fibrosis. Beth hosts CysticGal.blogspot.com to chronicle her experience, and that of the hundreds of twenty-somethings with cystic fibrosis who are living through dying each year.
author: Mary ElizaBeth Peters
